data.name: Pets Hotel
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MORE GAMES FROM OUR FRIENDS

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891250/Android_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2066740/ASMR_Food_Experience/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1239320/Animal_Shelter/

Welcome to Pets Hotel, a place where you can start the business of your dreams!

Pets Hotel gives you a unique opportunity to build, design, and run a place where pets can feel at home. Cats, dogs, turtles, and many other animals are waiting for you to take proper care of them!

All your little guests have different needs. Pet owners will tell you about them; it is your job to feed them accordingly to their demands. Don’t forget about grooming and play-time! A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all!

One of the biggest challenges that await you in Pets Hotel is designing and running a place where your customers can stay assured that they are leaving their beloved pets in good hands. Your competition never sleeps!

As the game progresses you will expand your business and make it the most premier pets hotel of all time! Imagine a place with a multitude of rooms, each designed and decorated for a different type of animal, with huge playgrounds surrounding your premium hotel! A truly fabulous place that you can create yourself.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
